name: Daniel Louis
text: Typical Pizza Hut. Very friendly staff always attentive. Great selection of pizzas (specialties and choose your own toppings), plus other foods. They often have good deals or specials, be sure to ask. Spacious. Easily accessible and very convenient parking. Handicap accessible parking.

name: Tim O'Sullivan
text:
We have eaten here a few times and to be fair the food has always been good.

The service dining in is terrible! They will come to your table eventually and when its time to pay there is nobody to be seen! And forget drink refills and the like.
